name: TORO
description: Torogram is a cutting-edge social media platform tailored for the crypto community. It uniquely combines traditional social networking with the latest web3 technology, allowing users to showcase their crypto assets and NFTs directly on their profiles and many more web3 features. The platform offers enhanced features like post and reply interactions, image and video uploads and advanced thread creation. Torogram stands out by offering crypto-focused discussions without censorship, encouraging open and free dialogue. Its user-friendly interface ensures a seamless experience. Torogram is redefining social media by integrating the dynamic world of cryptocurrency into everyday digital interactions.
